message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  While I'm interested, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. Would you be willing to come down to $90?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $110 is still a bit too high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $105?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
